verse:
कोऽहं ब्रूहि सखे स्‍वयं स भगवानार्य: स को राघव: 
के यूयं बत नाथ नाथ किमिदं दासोऽस्मि ते लक्ष्‍मण:। 
कान्‍तारे किमिहास्‍महे बत सखे देव्‍या गतिर्मृग्‍यते 
का देवी जनकारिधराजतनया हा जा‍नकि क्‍वासि हा।।
meaning: Meaning:Who am I? Tell me, O friend. I am myself. He is the noble divine being. Who is he? Rama. O Lord, what is this? I am your servant, Lakshmana. On this bank, what are we searching for here, O friend? The Goddess's whereabouts. Who is the Goddess? Sita, daughter of King Janaka. Alas, where are you, Sita?
